messages.messageBody:
Thank you for welcoming me into the group. I have a definite interest in things samurai (that's why I'm here...duh!!) and really appreciated the "misconceptions" article. I will keep the fallacies and myth stuff for the films and fantasy side and use it to give a good laugh to those. I really do appreciate the truth stuff, though. I am really looking forward to the information and discussions to come. Also...please forgive any bad puns I may occasionally make. I am also a bit of a clown/joker/geek. Thanks again. Gary Privitt (aka Granpa G, aka grandaddy_g)

__________________________________________________
